description:
The Chinese Government rolled out 5G as a surveillance infrastructure to track and rank all citizens using A.I.

This surveillance system has expanded dramatically in 2020 as a similar ""Smart City"" system is currently being planned for U.S. citizens.

Students in china are forced to wear headbands which record their electrical brain signals while China's largest smartphone maker is working on an A.I. that can read human thoughts and emotions.

Defend freedom.

#MarkOfTheBeast #IDChip #Agenda21 #2020 #NewWorldOrder #AI #HumansVsRobots #GodVsEvil #WakeUpPeople #SayNoToVaccines #StopBillGates #FuckNWO #5G
